title: NDIS Specialist Support Coordination
description: Expert Level 3 Support Coordination services helping NDIS participants navigate complex support needs and achieve their goals.
content:
What is Specialist Support Coordination?

Specialist Support Coordination is the highest level (Level 3) of NDIS support coordination, designed for participants with complex needs, challenging situations, or high-risk environments. Our specialist coordinators provide intensive support to help navigate the NDIS system and implement complex support arrangements.

Key Features of Specialist Support Coordination:

  • Higher level of support than standard coordination
  • Expertise in complex health, disability, and psychosocial needs
  • Crisis resolution and risk management
  • Coordination across multiple service systems

NDIS Support Coordination Levels

Level 1: Support Connection

Basic support to connect with providers and implement funded supports.

Level 2: Support Coordination

Assistance with coordination of supports and building capacity to maintain support arrangements.

Level 3: Specialist Support Coordination

Complex support coordination for high-intensity needs and challenging circumstances.

Specialist Support Coordination Qualifications

Our specialist support coordinators are highly qualified professionals with:

  • Tertiary qualifications in Allied Health, Social Work, or related fields
  • Extensive experience in complex support needs
  • NDIS registration and compliance training
  • Ongoing professional development in specialist areas

What Does a Specialist Support Coordinator Do?

A specialist support coordinator provides intensive support coordination services, including:

  • Complex needs assessment and planning
  • Crisis prevention and management
  • Multi-agency coordination and advocacy
  • Capacity building for long-term independence

NDIS Specialist Support Coordination Services

  • Complex support needs coordination
  • Crisis resolution and emergency planning
  • Provider engagement and service implementation
  • Capacity building and skill development
  • Advocacy and system navigation

Need Specialist Support Coordination?

Our experienced team of Level 3 Support Coordinators can help you navigate complex support needs and achieve your goals under the NDIS.

Get Started Today

Complex Support Coordination Expertise

We specialize in supporting participants with:

  • Multiple complex disabilities
  • Mental health and psychosocial disability
  • High-risk living situations
  • Complex medical needs
  • Child protection involvement
  • Justice system engagement
